class.name: com.krishagni.rbac.domain.Subject
class.sql-query: select subject_id as subjectId from rbac_subject_access_view where subject_id = :subjectId and resource = :resource and operation = :operation and (cp_id = :cpId or cp_id is null)

select subject_id as subjectId from rbac_subject_access_view where subject_id = :subjectId and resource = :resource and operation = :operation and (cp_id = :cpId or cp_id is null) and (site_id in (:siteIds) or site_id is null)
select cp_id as cpId, site_id as siteId from rbac_subject_access_view where resource = :resource and operation = :operation and subject_id = :userId
